Sentencas: Temperature distribution over a Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) surface is a crucial parameter for design of a SOFC stack.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of temperature distribution over a planar solid oxide fuel cell
Experimental investigation of temperature distribution over a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: both materials and the operating point of a stack is heavily affected by temperature gradient.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of temperature distribution over a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Temperature distribution can also be used for control and monitoring purposes.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of temperature distribution over a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: An experimental set-up consisting of a cross flow type stack of six cells was built to measure the temperature distribution in different current densities and in two oven temperatures.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of temperature distribution over a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Five thermocouples were inserted inside the middle cell to measure temperatures in four corners and in the middle of the cell.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of temperature distribution over a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Voltage was also measured for different cells using platinum wires.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of temperature distribution over a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Low fuel utilization (meaning low current density) and high excess air caused maximum temperature at the fuel inlet-air outlet corner.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of temperature distribution over a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Higher oven temperature caused more uniform temperature distribution, while increasing the current density resulted in higher temperature gradient over the cell surface.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of temperature distribution over a planar solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This paper provides measurement data and analysis of the results from the test runs.
Titulo: Experimental investigation of temperature distribution over a planar solid oxide fuel cell
